TextView.android:text: Pramod Hotels & Resorts was conceptualized and brought into fruition in 2011 in an effort to provide Cuttack with its first riverside resort. Nestled on the banks of the Mahanadi, the property was born out of a vision to provide luxurious stays to guests travelling to Cuttack and a superb hospitality experience for hosting events. Today, Pramod Convention and Club Resort is a destination of choice for events, stays and dining experiences. In 2015, Pramod Convention and Beach Resort, Puri was opened to guests. In addition to Pramod's signature hospitality, our Kings Court rooms, which feature direct access to the swimming pool, are a highlight of the property. Soon after, Odisha's only collection of luxury suites - Pramod House of Classics was unveiled in 2017. With seven unique themes, each suite is a gateway to a different world. With butler service, a private theatre and a chef-managed restaurant, the property provide bespoke experiences to guests.
